title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-10.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-10.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

On and after November 1, 2014, rates of reimbursement for residential habilitation services provided in community residences, including IRAs, and for day habilitation services, other than those provided by the Office for People with Developmental Disabilities, shall be determined in accordance with this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-10.1

Adopted, New

York State Register June 25, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 25, eff. 6/25/2014

Amended

New

York State Register April 22, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 16, eff. 4/22/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
